title: PRO’s New Women’s Specific Sirin Saddle Brings Comfort and Performance
content:
The saddle is one of the most important contact points between the rider and the bike. Not all butts are made the same, and an ill-fitting saddle can lead to some serious discomfort. That being said, the choices of saddles that female cyclists have had to pick from, have historically been limited compared to men’s or unisex models. This is especially true for those who push the limits and ride/race all out. The new PRO Sirin Team and Performance Saddles are here to address these needs.

The new Sirin Saddle was developed from the ground up for the world’s best female bicycle racers. It’s intended to “aid women in holding a more aggressive, aerodynamic position on the bike, and remain comfortable while doing so.”

The PRO Design Team took bike fit data from thousands of bike fitments in combination with a pelvic floor specialist, and a dedicated group of female test riders.

Designed for Women

“The PRO Sirin Saddles seeks to provide comfort to high-performance women cyclists, thereby enabling them to go further, faster,” Niek Verbakel, PRO Marketing Manager, stated. “These saddles are not a women’s version of the PRO Stealth Saddles but were designed and developed from the ground up to meet the needs we had identified. Details like the 35-millimeter nose width and the bridgeless cut-out are unique to the PRO Sirin Saddles, as is the shape.”

The process produced a saddle that sports a narrower nose, and steeper angles in the transition from the nose to the wings. It also has a lifted rear profile and a 32mm wide cut-out. The dual-density, lightweight, EVA padding with soft-cut edges to the cut-out help ensure comfort.

The Sirin is made with quality materials and available in two versions; Team and Performance. They both feature carbon-reinforced bases, lightweight EVA Padding, and durable PU covers. They are ergonomically wrapped and come with either carbon (Team) or Inox Stainless Steel (Performance) rails. Both are available in 152mm and 162mm wide models.
